summary: This is a brief email from a paralegal specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to an FBI contact, arranging for the transfer of a drive containing Epstein search warrant materials. It indicates ongoing investigative activity and evidence handling in November 2019.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: Employee of the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York who is arranging the transfer of a drive containing Epstein search warrant materials to the FBI.

events.title: Transfer of Epstein Search Warrant Materials
events.description: A paralegal specialist emails an FBI contact to arrange pickup of a drive containing search warrant materials related to the Epstein case.

locations: Southern District of New York Office
keyFacts: Evidence handling was ongoing in the Epstein investigation as of November 2019.
Search warrant materials were being physically transferred between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI.
The communication shows coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office (Southern District of New York) and the FBI regarding case evidence.
